item.title: First Steps in Learning the Use of Git and GitHub in RStudio
item.description:
I was so pleased to go live and animate a practical session about the first steps in learning the use of Git and GitHub in RStudio during a meetup organized by RStudio Enterprise Community Meetup.

This workshop served as an introduction to the use of Git and GitHub in RStudio. I was pleased to know that +140 people attended the session.

Please find in the following link my slides. The recording video is also available here.

You may add the upcoming events organized by RStudio Enterprise Community Meetup through the following link.

item.title: Getting familiar with Git and GitHub in RStudio
item.description:
I was delighted to animate a workshop for Oman R Users Group and R-Ladies Abuja. The announcement is available here.

This workshop served as an introduction to the use of Git and GitHub in RStudio. This workshop was designed for new R programmers, new GitHub users, new Git users, students, and managers. Besides, some programming knowledge with R will be helpful but is not required.

Please find in the following link my slides. The recording video is also available here.
